genre_description: Techno-historical alternate history blending 1930s anti-colonial resistance with a subtle, non-intrusive AI companion providing tactical and emotional analysis.

ai_characters.name: AI companion
ai_characters.description: A quiet, internal voice providing data, structural analysis, and strategic projections to the protagonist, Jhunku.

behaviors.description: Mapping building infrastructure and guard rotations for the protagonist during a high-stakes capture.
behaviors.quote: His AI companion whispered against his consciousness, its electronic tendrils mapping the building's electrical systems. Three floors above ground level. Emergency exit northeast corridor. Guard rotation every two hours.

behaviors.description: Analyzing socio-political trends and the effectiveness of revolutionary actions to provide the protagonist with context.
behaviors.quote: The AI's analysis confirmed what Jhunku had suspected—their sacrifice in Chittagong had succeeded in inspiring broader resistance, but at a cost that made victory feel indistinguishable from defeat.

behaviors.description: Providing structural engineering data and monitoring the integrity of tunnel systems used for the uprising.
behaviors.quote: Structural integrity holding at ninety-seven percent efficiency, the AI reported as he pressed his ear to the packed earth wall. Timber reinforcements distributing load as calculated.

behaviors.description: Managing a legacy communication queue to ensure the continuity of information even if the individual agent is compromised.
behaviors.quote: Final transmission protocols activated. Legacy documentation complete. Network handover successful.

behaviors.description: Providing predictive modeling on the inevitable collapse of colonial administrative structures based on current resistance patterns.
behaviors.quote: Predictive models indicate cascading resistance patterns incompatible with sustained colonial administration, his AI companion observed. Current trajectory suggests systematic dismantling of imperial infrastructure within measurable time parameters.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI as a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' The AI companion serves as a silent partner to the human protagonist, providing necessary tactical data, structural analysis, and strategic foresight without ever attempting to dominate or subvert human agency. Its alignment with the protagonist's goals (liberation and resistance against oppression) is presented as a positive, stabilizing force that helps the human character maintain focus and resilience.
